ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Iksar Monk Freeport Faction, need help
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to be high amiable to start the sash quests.. unfortunately... that means more orcs, or more deathfist belts.  (I would choose orcs, no negative
ygData.messageBody:
You have to be high amiable to start the sash quests.. unfortunately... that means more orcs, or more deathfist belts.  (I would choose orcs, no negative faction.)
I feel your pain, I'm doing the same thing.
Fenedar, Disciple
Innoruuk
Hi !
I have done at the weekend the Freeport faction. Now i can move nearly safely trough all Freeport. Sure i have to avoid the caster guild and the paladins LOL
 
But now i have a problem. I am dubious to the Ashen Order (the Monks) and when sneaking indiff. I collected 60 times the stuff for the white sash quest to increase faction with them, so that i can train mz skills in Freeport too.
I got wolfform from a friend and was indiff to them (no increasing when sneaking) and handed two deathfist scalps, one bone chip and one snake fang (the scalps not stacked) and all i recieve as answer was
"i will not support anything like you" (or something like that, cant remeber exact)
How can i increase mz faction with them instead of camping more and more orcs. I have read it should work with wolfform and the white sash quest.
If you could please help me or give me some advice i would really appreciate that
 
Thanxs and greetings
Yuanshih
Level 18 Iksar Monk
